title: GM Permissive
name: gmpermissive
description: Patches Greasemonkey to work on other URI schemes
author: Marcii <marcii@cssu.in>

preferences.title: about: URIs
preferences.name: aboutIsGreaseable
preferences.description: Allows scripts to run on about: scheme URIs

preferences.title: chrome:// URIs
preferences.name: chromeIsGreaseable
preferences.description: Allows scripts to run on chrome:// scheme URIs
